roleset.name: make higher

example.name: up-v: up yours!
example.text: Then the two camps upped the ante: Reports that Chosen Soren had donated directly to JSP members were rapidly countered by statements that the South Korean residents' organization had long been donating directly to LDP members.

roleset.note: UP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'up' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. Usage limited to"up the ante". (from up.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: at an increase

role.descr: specific aspect of/domain in which arg1 is increased

example.name: up-j: args 1, 5
example.text: She is still volume up , and I suspect part of her respiratory difficulties are secondary to fluid overload .

roleset.note: UP-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from up.02-j)

roleset.name: spatial: movement/location toward the top of some framework

role.descr: entity (or point) of comparison; start point

example.name: up-j
example.text: One our our cats is up in a tree.
example.amr: (u / up-03 :ARG1 (c / cat :ARG1-of (i2 / include-91 :ARG2 (c2 / cat :pl + :poss (w / we)) :ARG3 1)) :ARG2 (t / tree) :ARG5 (c3 / cartesian-framework-91 :ARG1 (e / environment)))

example.name: up-r
example.text: Move the block up two spaces .
example.amr: (m / move-01 :mode imperative :ARG0 (y / you) :ARG1 (b / block) :direction (t / trajectory :ARG2-of (u / up-03 :ARG5 (c / cartesian-framework-91 :ARG1 (b2 / build-space)))) :extent (d / distance-quantity :quant 2 :unit (s2 / space)))

example.name: up-r
example.text: The block is 2 spaces up the column from the bottom .
example.amr: (m / move-01 :mode imperative :ARG0 (y / you) :ARG1 (b / block) :direction (t / trajectory :ARG2-of (u / up-03 :ARG5 (c / cartesian-framework-91 :ARG1 (b2 / build-space)))) :extent (d / distance-quantity :quant 2 :unit (s2 / space)))

roleset.note: UP NOTES: Updated for SpatialAMR (added args3-5, reworded arg2 although it has the same coverage).
UP-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from up.03-j)

roleset.name: awake and perhaps out of bed/mobile

example.name: up-j: arg1
example.text: Mrs. Kent has continued to recover from surgery and is currently up sitting in bed during consultation today .

example.name: up-j: both args
example.text: My dad is up from bed, resting on the sofa.

roleset.note: UP-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on Medi-tmprl1to8. (from up.01-j)

roleset.name: informed with current knowledge

example.name: up-j
example.text: The seniors were more up on things

roleset.note: UP-J NOTES: Added by Julia for AMR.

roleset.name: toward the foreground; 'come' sense, anchored to a location but not a particular direction.

role.descr: entity located or moving toward the anchor
axis (points into the foreground, toward arg3)
presumptive start point, entity in comparison to

example.name: up-r
example.text: My parents are coming up this weekend.
example.amr: (c / come-01 :ARG1 (p / person :pl + :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91 :ARG1 i :ARG2 (p2 / parent))) :ARG4 (s / space :ARG1-of (u / up-09 :ARG3 i)) :time (w / weekend :mod (t / this)))

example.name: up-r
example.text: The whole orange block structure needs to be shifted up one block toward the purple block.
example.amr: (n / need-01 :ARG1 (s / shift-01 :ARG1 (s2 / structure :consist-of (b / block :color (o / orange)) :mod (w / whole)) :direction (t2 / trajectory ARG2-of (u / up-09 :ARG3 b3) :ARG4-of (t / toward-01 :ARG2 (b3 / block :color (p / purple)))) :extent (d / distance-quantity :quant 1 :unit (b2 / block))))

roleset.note: UP NOTES: Created for SpatialAMR. This sense is deictic and relies on an entity's position, but not the details of a particular axis system.

roleset.name: toward the background; 'go' sense, anchored to a location but not a particular direction

role.descr: entity located or moving away from the anchor
axis (points into the background, away from arg3)
end point, entity moved away from
presumptive start point, entity in comparison to
anchor, viewer-- entity whose vantage defines the background

example.name: up-r
example.text: now three going up from that
example.amr: (b / be-destined-for-91 :ARG1 (t / thing :quant 3) :ARG2 (s / space :ARG2-of (g / go-35 :ARG1 t) :ARG1-of (u / up-10 :ARG4 (t2 / thing :mod (t3 / that)))) :time (n / now))

roleset.note: UP NOTES: Created for SpatialAMR. This sense is deictic and relies on an entity's position, but not the details of a particular axis system.

example.name: up-r
example.text: the U should be 3 across and 3 up on each side
example.amr: (r / recommend-01 :ARG1 (a / and :op1 (a2 / across-03 :ARG1 (t / thing :configuration (s / string-entity :value "U")) :ARG2 (d / distance-quantity :quant 3) :ARG4 (c / cartesian-framework-91 :ARG1 t :FR (i3 / intrinsic))) :op2 (u / up-11 :ARG1 t :ARG2 (d2 / distance-quantity :quant 3) :ARG3 (s2 / side :mod (e / each)) :ARG4 c) :ARG1-of (i2 / instead-of-91)))

roleset.name: upper: part/whole; be the top most portion of something

example.name: up-r
example.text: so add one block on both sides of the upper orange block along the same direction as the body .
example.amr: (a / add-02 :mode imperative :ARG0 (y / you) :ARG1 (b / block :pl +) :ARG2 (s / space :pl + :ARG1-of (o / on-06 :ARG2 (s2 / side :pl + :mod (b2 / both) :part-of (b3 / block :color (o2 / orange) :ARG1-of (u / upper-12 :ARG3 (c / cartesian-framework-91 :ARG1 (b6 / build-space)))))) :ARG1-of (a2 / along-01 :ARG3 (d / direction :ARG1-of (s3 / same-01 :ARG2 (b4 / body))))) :frequency (r / rate-entity-91 :ARG1 (b5 / block :quant 1 :ARG1-of (i2 / include-91 :ARG2 b)) :ARG2 (s4 / side :quant 1 :ARG1-of (i3 / include-91 :ARG2 s2))))

roleset.name: orientation: the intrinsic top of the object points downward in some framework

example.name: upside_down-j
example.text: yep ; it 's an upside down V in red still
example.amr: (a / and :op1 (c / confirm-01) :op2 (h / have-configuration-91 :ARG1 (i2 / it) :ARG2 (s / string-entity :value "V" :ARG1-of (u / upside-down-07 :ARG3 (c2 / cartesian-framework-91 :ARG1 (b / build-space))))) :op2 (h2 / have-color-91 :ARG1 i2 :ARG2 (r / red) :mod (s2 / still)))

roleset.note: UPSIDE DOWN NOTES: Created for SpatialAMR.

roleset.name: orientation: the intrinsic top of the object points upwards in some framework

role.descr: anchor (framework in which the intrisic top points 'up')

example.name: upright-j
example.text: the next one is upright and we will start with the tips on the ground
example.amr: (a / and :op1 (u / upright-08 :ARG1 (t / thing :quant 1 :mod (n / next)) :ARG3 (c / cartesian-framework-91 :ARG1 (b / build-space))) :op2 (s / start-01 :ARG0 (w / we) :ARG2 (t2 / tip :pl +) :location (s2 / space :pl + :ARG1-of (o / on-top-03 :ARG2 (g / ground) :ARG3 c))))

roleset.note: UPSIDE DOWN NOTES: Created for SpatialAMR.

roleset.name: up a creek without a paddle: be in a difficult situation

mapping.source: (A / up-03 :arg1 (n1 / NARG1) :arg2 (B / creek :consist-of (C / thing :ARG1-of (s / shit-01))) :accompanier (n3 / NARG3 :polarity -) :accompanier (n4 / NARG4 :polarity -) :domain (n2 / NARG2))
mapping.target: (A / experience-01 :arg0 (n1 / NARG1) :arg1 (n2 / NARG2 :arg1-of (d / difficult-01)) :arg1-of (h / have-instrument-91 :polarity - :arg2 (t / thing :arg0-of (h2 / help-01 :arg1 n2 :arg2 n1))))

example.name: up_creek-m
example.text: I figured I was up shit creek on this but I was hoping for a at least half a paddle.
example.amr: (c / contrast-01 :ARG1 (f / figure-01 :ARG0 (i / i) :ARG1 (u / up-creek-13 :ARG1 i :ARG2 (t / this))) :ARG2 (h / hope-01 :ARG0 i :ARG1 (p / paddle :quant (a / at-least :op1 "1/2") :ARG3-of u)))

example.name: up_creek-m
example.text: Dee Paterson is up a creek without a paddle or a boat after gaining her first call-up to the Great Biritain Freestyle Canoeing team.
example.arg: without a paddle or a boat
after gaining her first call-up to the Great Biritain Freestyle Canoeing team.
example.amr: (u / up-creek-13 :ARG1 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Dee" :op2 "Paterson")) :ARG3 (p2 / paddle :polarity -) :ARG4 (b / boat :polarity -) :time (a / after :op1 (g / gain-01 :ARG0 p :ARG1 (c / call-up-08 :ARG1 p :ARG2 (t / team :name (n2 / name :op1 "Great" :op2 "Britain" :op3 "Freestyle" :op4 "Canoeing" :op5 "team"))

roleset.note: UP A CREEK NOTES: Added by Julia, idiom split off from up-03 during Spatial AMR framing. While the boat and the paddle are part of the idiom, they are heavily modifiable as intensifiers for the expression and so have been given roles.
